DataElement.preferredName: Linear Analogue Self-Assessment Past Week Concern About Finances Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their concerns about finances during the past week, using an eleven point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Linear Analogue Self-Assessment Past Week Concern About Finances Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual has or had concerns about finances._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy.

Concepts.definition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Concern About Finances Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about whether an individual has or had concerns about finances.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about whether an individual has or had concerns about finances.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A matter of interest or importance._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Constant Concern To No Concern 11 Range Likert Score 2

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Constant Concern To No Concern 11 Range Likert Score 2
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Continually recurring or continuing without interruption.: A matter of interest or importance.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: The non-affirmative response to a question.: A matter of interest or importance.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.: A subjective score of 2 on a Likert scale.
